desc.en: Already far into the off-work time, yet no trace of Serika can be found. Shiroko thinks it is the Helmet Gang who kidnaps her, and the returned Sensei and Hoshino proves that guess.

desc.en: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.

desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，愛麗絲。桃井为了阻止遊戲開發部被废社，于是便把愛麗絲带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，爱丽丝。桃井为了阻止游戏开发部被废社，于是便把爱丽丝带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，爱丽丝。桃为了阻止游戏开发部被废社，于是便把爱丽丝带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。

desc.en: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.

desc.en: In one sinkhole, the three found Aris who was asleep, as well as some text like "AL-1S". Momoi took pity on her and decided to take her back to Millennium. She also gave her own clothes for Aris to wear on. Aris woke up right after the interaction with Sensei.

desc.zh_tw: 三人在废墟的一个天坑里发现了睡着着的愛麗絲，发现了“AL-1S”之类的字样。綠可怜愛麗絲，便决定将她带回千年，还给她穿上了自己的衣服。就在这时，愛麗絲因与老师接触而醒了过来。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 三人在废墟的一个天坑里发现了睡着着的爱丽丝，发现了“AL-1S”之类的字样。绿可怜爱丽丝，便决定将她带回千禧年，还给她穿上了自己的衣服。就在这时，爱丽丝因与老师接触而醒了过来。

desc.en: Momoi took Aris back to the club room and Midori was shocked. Knowing barely anything, Aris started tossing the stuffs in the club room, like putting controllers and game consoles into month. Momoi then revealed her plan: she wanted to let Aris pretend to be a student at here, solving the club member number problem.
desc.jp: Momoi took Aris back to the club room and Midori was shocked. Knowing barely anything, Aris started tossing the stuffs in the club room, like putting controllers and game consoles into month. Momoi then revealed her plan: she wanted to let Aris pretend to be a student at here, solving the club member number problem.

desc.zh_tw: 桃井将愛麗絲带回到社团活动室，綠非常惊诧。愛麗絲因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃井随后说出了自己的计划：她想让愛麗絲伪装成千年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井将爱丽丝带回到社团活动室，绿非常惊诧。爱丽丝因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃井随后说出了自己的计划：她想让爱丽丝伪装成千禧年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃将爱丽丝带回到社团活动室，绿非常惊诧。爱丽丝因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃随后说出了自己的计划：她想让爱丽丝伪装成千年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。

desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲开心地玩着遊戲開發部的前作<传说年代记>。遊戲開發部全员看她玩得这么开心都大受感动。

desc.en: Momoi and Midori discussed the feasibility of disguising Aris as a Millennium student. Momoi was in charge of getting a falsified student ID card, while Midori and Yuzu would teach Aris how to "speak", in the hope of modifying her fixed speech pattern.
desc.jp: Momoi and Midori discussed the feasibility of disguising Aris as a Millennium student. Momoi was in charge of getting a falsified student ID card, while Midori and Yuzu would teach Aris how to "speak", in the hope of modifying her fixed speech pattern.

desc.ko: Momoi and Midori discussed the feasibility of disguising Aris as a Millennium student. Momoi was in charge of getting a falsified student ID card, while Midori and Yuzu would teach Aris how to "speak", in the hope of modifying her fixed speech pattern.
desc.zh_tw: 桃井和綠讨论将愛麗絲伪装成千年学生计划的可行性。桃井负责去拿到假学生证，而綠和柚子负责教愛麗絲“说话”，希望将其高度机械化的语音模式修改过来。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井和绿讨论将爱丽丝伪装成千禧年学生计划的可行性。桃井负责去拿到假学生证，而绿和柚子负责教爱丽丝“说话”，希望将其高度机械化的语音模式修改过来。

desc.en: Momoi left in advance and Midori was troubled with how to teach. At this moment Aris found a magazine about the game they made before. Midori then decided to let Aris try their games, attempting to teach her with in-game dialogues.
desc.jp: Momoi left in advance and Midori was troubled with how to teach. At this moment Aris found a magazine about the game they made before. Midori then decided to let Aris try their games, attempting to teach her with in-game dialogues.

desc.zh_tw: 桃井先行离开，綠为如何教愛麗絲说话而苦恼着。这时，愛麗絲则发现了一本曾经写着他们做的游戏的杂志。綠于是决定让愛麗絲玩玩自己的游戏，试着用游戏中的对话教会愛麗絲。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井先行离开，绿为如何教爱丽丝说话而苦恼着。这时，爱丽丝则发现了一本曾经写着他们做的游戏的杂志。绿于是决定让爱丽丝玩玩自己的游戏，试着用游戏中的对话教会爱丽丝。

desc.en: Aris started the game while Momoi and Midori explained about the game. Though faced with countless failures and crashed her system for several times, she kept going on and eventually made it.

desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲一边开始游戏，一边听桃井和綠的讲解。尽管愛麗絲多次失败且遇到了系统卡死问题，但她仍奋起直追，最终通关。

desc.zh_tw: 在桃井和綠两人的帮助下，愛麗絲在三小时内通关了True End。两人问及愛麗絲对游戏的评价时，愛麗絲认为游戏很有意思，听到此言的柚子终于从柜子里出来了。柚子真诚地对愛麗絲道了谢。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在桃井和绿两人的帮助下，爱丽丝在三小时内通关了True End。两人问及爱丽丝对游戏的评价时，爱丽丝认为游戏很有意思，听到此言的柚子终于从柜子里出来了。柚子真诚地对爱丽丝道了谢。

desc.en: The situation seems hopeless and everyone's morale has hit rock bottom. Yuzu, who had been carefully observing the battle between Neru and Toki, proposes a way to neutralize Abi-Eshuh.
desc.jp: The situation seems hopeless and everyone's morale has hit rock bottom. Yuzu, who had been carefully observing the battle between Neru and Toki, proposes a way to neutralize Abi-Eshuh.
desc.thai: The situation seems hopeless and everyone's morale has hit rock bottom. Yuzu, who had been carefully observing the battle between Neru and Toki, proposes a way to neutralize Abi-Eshuh.
desc.ko: The situation seems hopeless and everyone's morale has hit rock bottom. Yuzu, who had been carefully observing the battle between Neru and Toki, proposes a way to neutralize Abi-Eshuh.
desc.zh_tw: 情况陷入绝望。正当大家灰心丧气之际，仔细观察寧瑠与季战斗的柚子挺身而出，提出能让「Abi-Eshuh」失去作用的方法。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 情况陷入绝望。正当大家灰心丧气之际，仔细观察尼禄与时战斗的柚子挺身而出，提出能让「Abi-Eshuh」失去作用的方法。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 情况陷入绝望。正当大家灰心丧气之际，仔细观察宁瑠与季战斗的柚子挺身而出，提出能让「Abi-Eshuh」失去作用的方法。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 情况陷入绝望。正当大家灰心丧气之际，仔细观察妮露与时战斗的柚子挺身而出，提出能让「Abi-Eshuh」失去作用的方法。

desc.en: All retreated into a closer building. Chihiro summarized the current situation: the C&C were not strong enough (with Neru still in coma), the Engineering Department were exhausted, and the combat power of GDD could not even be counted. Everyone thought believed that every method had been used, and the "bad ending", as Midori suggested, had arrived.
desc.jp: All retreated into a closer building. Chihiro summarized the current situation: the C&C were not strong enough (with Neru still in coma), the Engineering Department were exhausted, and the combat power of GDD could not even be counted. Everyone thought believed that every method had been used, and the "bad ending", as Midori suggested, had arrived.

Everyone thought believed that every method had been used, and the "bad ending", as Midori suggested, had arrived.
desc.ko: All retreated into a closer building. Chihiro summarized the current situation: the C&C were not strong enough (with Neru still in coma), the Engineering Department were exhausted, and the combat power of GDD could not even be counted. Everyone thought believed that every method had been used, and the "bad ending", as Midori suggested, had arrived.
desc.zh_tw: 所有人撤退到了一幢较近的建筑物中。千尋总结，C&C还不够强，而且寧瑠尚且仍在昏迷，工程師部已经累趴下了，而遊戲開發部的战力甚至算不上什么。大家都认为一切方法已经耗尽，所有人最不想见到的“Bad Ending”，如綠所言，已然到来。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 所有人撤退到了一幢较近的建筑物中。千寻总结，C&C还不够强，而且尼禄尚且仍在昏迷，工程部已经累趴下了，而游戏开发部的战力甚至算不上什么。大家都认为一切方法已经耗尽，所有人最不想见到的“Bad Ending”，如绿所言，已然到来。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 所有人撤退到了一幢较近的建筑物中。千寻总结，C&C还不够强，而且妮露尚且仍在昏迷，工程部已经累趴下了，而游戏开发部的战力甚至算不上什么。大家都认为一切方法已经耗尽，所有人最不想见到的“Bad Ending”，如绿所言，已然到来。

desc.en: Hearing "Bad Ending", Neru suddenly woke up. Neru steadied herself and demanded an answer from GDD, "Is that all you got to rescue Aris?" Though serverly injured, she said she was on the same boat with others, and should not waste this opportunity. When Momoi asked how to actually make it, Yuzu reported her discovery.

desc.zh_tw: 寧瑠一听“Bad Ending”突然就醒了过来。寧瑠强行支撑着，质问遊戲開發部的人“就只有这点决心吗”，表示虽然受重伤，但同大家一样，不能就此放弃、白费。而当桃井问出要如何应对季的时候，柚子讲述了自己的发现。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 妮露一听“Bad Ending”突然就醒了过来。妮露强行支撑着，质问游戏开发部的人“就只有这点决心吗”，表示虽然受重伤，但同大家一样，不能就此放弃、白费。而当桃问出要如何应对时的时候，柚子讲述了自己的发现。

desc.en: Yuzu was convinced that Neru did inflict damage on Toki. Chihiro pointed out the Toki's suit didn't seem to be functioning well when calculating the parameters of both the fall and the attack. Yuzu asked whether Neru was at her best in close combat; Neru replied yes, and Yuzu then formed a plan - with the usage of the "tricks."

desc.zh_tw: 柚子确信寧瑠对季造成了伤害。千尋指出，季的机甲似乎无法同时计算坠落时的参数与攻击参数，此时便出现了破绽。柚子询问寧瑠是否是在近距离作战时最优，寧瑠表达了肯定，而柚子则有了个计划——他们可以用“套路”。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 柚子确信尼禄对时造成了伤害。千寻指出，时的机甲似乎无法同时计算坠落时的参数与攻击参数，此时便出现了破绽。柚子询问尼禄是否是在近距离作战时最优，尼禄表达了肯定，而柚子则有了个计划——他们可以用“套路”。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 柚子确信宁瑠对季造成了伤害。千寻指出，季的机甲似乎无法同时计算坠落时的参数与攻击参数，此时便出现了破绽。柚子询问宁瑠是否是在近距离作战时最优，宁瑠表达了肯定，而柚子则有了个计划——他们可以用“套路”。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 柚子确信妮露对时造成了伤害。千寻指出，时的机甲似乎无法同时计算坠落时的参数与攻击参数，此时便出现了破绽。柚子询问妮露是否是在近距离作战时最优，妮露表达了肯定，而柚子则有了个计划——他们可以用“套路”。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
